page.title: 02POPULATION
page.content: Sedgmoor District Estimate of population in O.S grid squares 24,37/25,37/26,37/27,37/ 24,36/25,36/26,36/27,36/ 24,35/25,35/26,35/27,35/ in the CHRLINCH,ENMORE,DURLEIGH,WEMBDON,ECT AREA.1981 Census statistics are not accessible on a grid square basis therefore following is estimate delivered from information available on a parish basis.The selected grid squares fall 9 different parishes. The total population of each parish within any relevent grid square has been estimated on the basis of settlement pattern. (Recent amendment to following figures by computer calculation gives total population 400 higher).
